localizedMeta.description:
THIS CONTENT IS NOT COMPATIBLE WITH Android™ DEVICES.

Destroy rocks in this arcade-styled shooter!

* Earn currency to purchase upgrades/shields
* Unlock different afterburner trails
* Timed and survival modes

Package size: 31 MB - More storage space required for install

Compatibility information:
Number of players for local play: 1 Player

Supported interfaces/sensors
- Touchscreen
- Controller / On-screen controller

Supported languages:
English(United States)/English(United Kingdom)

Copyright(C) 2015 goodSuM games All Rights Reserved.

Android is a trademark of Google Inc.
